sentence.text: Three loci with high mutation frequencies, the 138665410 negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated gene variant, the 23862952 regulation of the force of heart contraction gene variant, and the 71098693 epithelial cell development gene variant were found to be significantly associated with sporadic ASD (PAAAA0.05); variants in FOXL2 and MYH6 were found in patients with isolated, sporadic ASD (PAAAA5Ã—10^-4).

entity.text: regulation of the force of heart contraction

sentence.text: CONCLUSIONS This was the first study that demonstrated variants in negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated and epithelial cell development associated with sporadic ASD, and supported the use of WES and bioinformatics analysis to identify disease-associated mutations
